name: get_address_transactions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool address_monitor.
Tool description: Monitor EVM network address transactions and get prompt and reliable webhook call with transaction details
API description: Fetches transactions for a given address from the specified network.

network.description: The blockchain network to query (default is 'BSC_TESTNET').

limit.description: The maximum number of transactions to return (default is '10').

offset.description: The number of transactions to skip before starting to return results (default is '0').

monitoraddressid.description: The ID of the address to monitor (default is '8485d9c3-7f52-4ba7-8ec2-41543effa6ae').
